short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically checks the political bias of a news article using Artificial Intelligence.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Veritai is on a mission to revolutionize journalism.  We are building a multimedia platform leveraging A.I. to provide quick, concise, and trusted analytics of news and media.  

Also, use the Veritai bias engine easily with the following hashtags on Twitter: #veritaibeta or #veritaibias.
